means: 可预见地，果不出所料地，脱不出老一套地

sentence.Network_en: His article is, predictably, a scathing attack on capitalism.
sentence.Network_cn: 可想而知，他的文章是对资本主义的严厉抨击。

sentence.Network_en: The party has predictably rejected the proposals as a subterfuge.
sentence.Network_cn: 不出所料，该党以这些提议是在耍花招为由而加以拒绝。

PerfectNetExp.abs: Jurassic bugs 最老昆虫琥珀 ... striking echoes 惊人的相似之处 predictably 可预见地 chipping away at 剥落，敲凿（化石）.
大学英语精读单词表(第四册) - 豆丁网 ... pledge vt. 发誓， 保证 predictably ad. 可预言地 uncover vt. 揭开…盖子； 发现.
托业短语 - 豆丁网 ... Typographer 打字工 Predictably 可预测地 Durably 持丽地.

list.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... precocious 早熟的 predict 预言,预报 predisposition 倾向,癖性.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... jurisdiction n 司法权 predict v 预言；预告 indict v 起诉，控诉.
除了可预测性（predictability）之外，我觉得可行性（feasibility）对我来说，比较重要啦。ㄟ？
预测（prediction）和预言(prophecy) 是有分别的。在英语中这两个词很容易就被混淆。
八年级下册英语单词_百度百科 ... 39 predict v. 预知,预言,预报 41 prediction n. 预言,预报 43 come true 实现,达到.

entry.tran: 可预言的；可预测的；可预料的
entry.def: If you say that an event is predictable, you mean that it is obvious in advance that it will happen.

example.ex: This was a predictable reaction, given the bitter hostility between the two countries...
example.tran: 考虑到这两个国家之间激烈的敌对情绪，这种反应是可以预见的。
这个结果完全在预料之中。

means.word_mean: 1. in a predictable manner or to a predictable degree;

sentences.sentence: "predictably, he did not like the news"

auth_sentence.content: These mutations are predictable, yes - predictably random.
auth_sentence.res_content: These mutations are predictable, yes - predictably random.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: These mutations are predictable, yes - predictably random.

auth_sentence.content: It was provided, predictably, by Dimitar Berbatov.
auth_sentence.res_content: It was provided, predictably, by Dimitar Berbatov.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It was provided, predictably, by Dimitar Berbatov.

auth_sentence.content: Predictably, the economic optimism buoyed copper and crude.
auth_sentence.res_content: Predictably, the economic optimism buoyed copper and crude.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Predictably, the economic optimism buoyed copper and crude.

means.word_mean: 可预见地；果不出所料地;脱不出老一套地

sentences.en: I asked the boss for a rise and his reply was predictably short and sweet!
sentences.cn: 我要求老板增加我的工资,他的回答如意料的一样,简单明了!
